description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京紫禁城内的综合性博物馆，建立在明清两代皇宫及其收藏的基础上，是世界上接待游客最繁忙的博物馆之一。
description.en: A comprehensive museum located within the Forbidden City in Beijing, China, established based on the imperial palaces of the Ming and Qing dynasties and their collections. It is one of the busiest museums in the world in terms of visitor numbers.

description.zh-cn: 明清两代的皇家宫殿，是中国古代宫廷建筑之精华。1925年在此成立故宫博物院。
description.en: The imperial palace of the Ming and Qing dynasties, representing the pinnacle of ancient Chinese palatial architecture. The Palace Museum was established here in 1925.

description.zh-cn: 明朝第三位皇帝，于永乐年间下令始建紫禁城。
description.en: The third emperor of the Ming Dynasty, who ordered the construction of the Forbidden City during the Yongle era.

description.zh-cn: 清朝最后一位皇帝。1924年被逐出紫禁城，为故宫博物院的建立提供了条件。
description.en: The last emperor of the Qing Dynasty. He was expelled from the Forbidden City in 1924, which paved the way for the establishment of the Palace Museum.

description.zh-cn: 民国时期军阀，于1924年发动甲子政变，将清朝末代皇帝溥仪逐出紫禁城。
description.en: A warlord during the Republic of China era who launched the Beijing Coup in 1924, expelling the last Qing emperor Puyi from the Forbidden City.

description.zh-cn: 由冯玉祥发动的军事政变，推翻了总统曹锟的统治，并导致清帝溥仪被逐出紫禁城，直接促成了故宫博物院的建立。
description.en: A military coup launched by Feng Yuxiang that overthrew President Cao Kun's government and led to the expulsion of Emperor Puyi from the Forbidden City, directly contributing to the establishment of the Palace Museum.

description.zh-cn: 民国时期政治人物，其摄政内阁于1924年下令将溥仪驱逐出宫。
description.en: A politician in the Republic of China era whose regency cabinet ordered the expulsion of Puyi from the palace in 1924.

description.zh-cn: 故宫博物院的主要创建者之一。他建议设立清室善后委员会，并担任首任委员长，后又担任故宫博物院理事长。
description.en: One of the main founders of the Palace Museum. He proposed the establishment of the Committee for the Disposition of the Qing Imperial Possessions, served as its first chairman, and later as the chairman of the Palace Museum's board.

description.zh-cn: 为处理溥仪被逐出宫后相关事宜而成立的委员会，由李煜瀛任委员长，该委员会制定了故宫博物院的组织大纲，直接推动了博物院的成立。
description.en: A committee established to handle matters after Puyi's expulsion from the palace, chaired by Li Yuying. It drafted the organizational framework for the Palace Museum, directly promoting its establishment.

description.zh-cn: 即中国抗日战争。战争期间，为保护文物免遭战火，故宫博物院将大批珍贵文物南迁西迁。
description.en: Also known as the Second Sino-Japanese War. During the war, to protect artifacts from destruction, the Palace Museum relocated a large number of precious items to the south and west of China.

en: Nationalist government of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 1925年至1948年间统治中国的政府。该政府下令故宫文物南迁，并在1948至1949年将部分文物精品运往台湾。
description.en: The government that ruled China from 1925 to 1948. It ordered the southern relocation of the Palace Museum's artifacts and transported a selection of them to Taiwan between 1948 and 1949.

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台北市的博物馆，其馆藏核心为1948至1949年间从大陆运至台湾的故宫文物。
description.en: A museum in Taipei, Taiwan, whose core collection consists of artifacts from the Palace Museum that were transported from the mainland to Taiwan between 1948 and 1949.

description.zh-cn: 曾任故宫博物院院长。在国民政府下令将留平文物菁华运往南京时，他以各种理由推延，使得这批文物最终留在了北京。
description.en: Former director of the Palace Museum. When the Nationalist government ordered the shipment of selected artifacts remaining in Beiping to Nanjing, he used various reasons to delay the process, ensuring the items ultimately remained in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 民国时期教育家、政治人物。曾于1928年提案废除故宫博物院并变卖其文物，但未成功。
description.en: An educator and politician during the Republic of China era. In 1928, he proposed abolishing the Palace Museum and selling its artifacts, but was unsuccessful.

description.zh-cn: 民国时期政治人物，时任古物保管委员会委员长。他坚决反对经亨颐废除故宫的提案，成功保全了故宫博物院。
description.en: A politician during the Republic of China era and then-chairman of the Antiquities Preservation Committee. He strongly opposed Jing Hengyi's proposal to abolish the Palace Museum, successfully preserving it.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国时期的一场政治运动。期间，故宫博物院被中央下令关闭，以免受破坏。
description.en: A political movement in the People's Republic of China. During this period, the Palace Museum was ordered closed by the central government to protect it from destruction.

description.zh-cn: 故宫博物院第一任院长。
description.en: The first director of the Palace Museum.

description.zh-cn: 现任故宫博物院院长。
description.en: The current director of the Palace Museum.

description.zh-cn: 明成祖朱棣于永乐四年（1406年）下令兴建北京宫殿，于永乐十八年（1420年）落成。
description.en: The Yongle Emperor (Zhu Di) ordered the construction of the palace in Beijing in 1406, and it was completed in 1420.

description.zh-cn: 故宫博物院是在明清两代皇宫紫禁城及其收藏的基础上建立的博物馆。
description.en: The Palace Museum was established based on the Forbidden City, the imperial palace of the Ming and Qing dynasties, and its collections.

description.zh-cn: 冯玉祥于1924年10月率部发动甲子政变。
description.en: Feng Yuxiang led his troops to launch the Beijing Coup in October 1924.

description.zh-cn: 甲子政变后，溥仪于1924年11月5日被废除皇帝头衔并被逐出紫禁城。
description.en: After the Beijing Coup, Puyi was stripped of his imperial title and expelled from the Forbidden City on November 5, 1924.

description.zh-cn: 黄郛领导的摄政内阁公布修正《清室优待条件》，并将溥仪驱逐出宫。
description.en: The regency cabinet led by Huang Fu announced the revision of the 'Articles of Favorable Treatment for the Qing Imperial House' and expelled Puyi from the palace.

description.zh-cn: 李煜瀛（李石曾）建议设立清室善后委员会并任委员长，是故宫博物院的主要创建者之一。
description.en: Li Yuying (Li Shizeng) proposed the establishment of the Committee for the Disposition of the Qing Imperial Possessions and served as its chairman, becoming one of the main founders of the Palace Museum.

description.zh-cn: 清室善后委员会制定了“故宫博物院临时组织大纲”，直接促成了故宫博物院于1925年10月10日的正式成立。
description.en: The Committee for the Disposition of the Qing Imperial Possessions drafted the 'Temporary Organizational Outline of the Palace Museum,' which directly led to the formal establishment of the museum on October 10, 1925.

description.zh-cn: 在被逐出紫禁城之前，溥仪有计划地将1300余件书画精品和大量珍宝盗运出宫，造成了未来故宫博物院的藏品损失。
description.en: Before being expelled from the Forbidden City, Puyi systematically smuggled out over 1,300 fine paintings and calligraphies and numerous treasures, causing a loss to the future collection of the Palace Museum.

description.zh-cn: 为躲避日本侵略，故宫博物院于1933年开始将大批文物南迁，此后又因战事西迁，导致藏品长期流离在外。
description.en: To evade the Japanese invasion, the Palace Museum began relocating a large number of artifacts southward in 1933, and later westward due to the war, causing the collection to be displaced for a long period.

description.zh-cn: 于1948至1949年间，将2972箱南迁文物精品转运至台湾，并最终在台北建立国立故宫博物院。
description.en: Between 1948 and 1949, it transported 2,972 crates of selected artifacts from the southern relocation to Taiwan, eventually establishing the National Palace Museum in Taipei.

description.zh-cn: 在国民政府下令将留平文物菁华运往南京时，时任院长马衡以各种理由推延装箱，使这批文物最终未被运走。
description.en: When the Nationalist government ordered the shipment of selected artifacts remaining in Beiping to Nanjing, then-director Ma Heng used various reasons to delay the packing, resulting in these items not being transported.

description.zh-cn: 于1928年提案废除故宫博物院，并提议变卖其馆藏文物，但该提案最终未能成功。
description.en: In 1928, he proposed to abolish the Palace Museum and sell off its collection, but the proposal was ultimately unsuccessful.

description.zh-cn: 作为古物保管委员会委员长，他坚决反对经亨颐废除故宫的提案，成功保全了故宫博物院。
description.en: As the chairman of the Antiquities Preservation Committee, he strongly opposed Jing Hengyi's proposal to abolish the Palace Museum, thus successfully preserving it.

description.zh-cn: 因文化大革命，中央命令故宫于1966年至1971年闭馆，以保护其免受破坏。
description.en: Due to the Cultural Revolution, the central government ordered the Palace Museum to close from 1966 to 1971 to protect it from destruction.

description.zh-cn: 易培基担任故宫博物院首任院长。
description.en: Yi Peiji served as the first director of the Palace Museum.

description.zh-cn: 马衡长期担任故宫博物院院长，经历了文物南迁和政权更迭等重要时期。
description.en: Ma Heng served as the director of the Palace Museum for a long period, experiencing important events such as the southern relocation of artifacts and the change of government.

description.zh-cn: 王旭东于2019年4月起担任故宫博物院院长。
description.en: Wang Xudong has been the director of the Palace Museum since April 2019.
